subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Matt Bryant kicked a 47-yard field goal with 9 seconds remaining to give the Falcons a 20-17 victory over the Packers, one of the teams trying to chase down Atlanta in the N.F.C. standings.
snippet: Matt Bryant kicked a 47-yard field goal with 9 seconds remaining to give the Falcons a 20-17 victory over the Packers, one of the teams trying to chase down Atlanta in the N.F.C. standings.
